Rule.Name: Ensure 'MUST_CHANGE' is set to 'ON' for all SQL authenticated logins
Rule.NonCompliantComment: The 'MUST_CHANGE' option is not set to 'ON' for all SQL authenticated logins.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Set the 'MUST_CHANGE' option to 'ON' for all SQL authenticated logins.

Rule.Name: Ensure 'CHECK_EXPIRATION' is set to 'ON' for all SQL authenticated logins in the Sysadmin role
Rule.NonCompliantComment: The 'CHECK_EXPIRATION' option is not set to 'ON' for all SQL authenticated logins within the Sysadmin role.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Ensure the 'CHECK_EXPIRATION' option is set to 'ON' for all SQL authenticated logins within the Sysadmin role. Command : ALTER LOGIN [username] WITH CHECK_EXPIRATION = ON;
Rule.Verification: SELECT name, is_expiration_checked FROM sys.sql_logins WHERE is_expiration_checked = 0;

Rule.Name: Ensure 'CHECK_POLICY' is set to 'ON' for all SQL authenticated logins
Rule.NonCompliantComment: The 'CHECK_POLICY' option is not set to 'ON' for all SQL authenticated logins.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Ensure the 'CHECK_POLICY' option is set to 'ON' for all SQL authenticated logins. Command : ALTER LOGIN [username] WITH CHECK_POLICY = ON;
Rule.Verification: SELECT name, is_policy_checked FROM sys.sql_logins WHERE is_policy_checked = 0;
